creator: 1tlewis@comcast.net
remm@apache.org
text:
Look: did you see the basic arithmetic test in the examples ?
You have to remember to use the Servlet 2.4 descriptors in your web.xml,
otherwise the EL is disabled.
Yes, I saw the examples.  And yes, I enabled EL in the descriptor.
creator: 1tlewis@comcast.net
kin-man.chung@sun.com
text:
You must use a servlet 2.4 web.xml.  Setting el-ignored to false in a 2.3
web.xml will not work.

If you still have problems, supply a test case in war.
